cards.Name: Beelzebul, King of Nightmares
cards.Passive:
Stalker (Passive): Characters cannot be played into the opposing slot. At the beginning of the contest phase, deal 6 damage to a random uncontested non-Mattervoid character.

Voided (Passive): If a character would be returned to hand; place it under Beelzebul, King of Nightmares instead. When Beelzebul, King of Nightmares leaves the field, return characters under it to their owner's hand.
cards.Special: Will of Kings (Special): Return 6 Mattervoid characters from your forgotten zone to the bottom of your deck: Draw a card.

cards.Name: Ba'al, Archangel of Void
cards.Claim: Stolen Memories (Claim): Return 5 Mattervoid characters from your forgotten zone to the bottom of your deck: Convert and activate a Turning Point in any forgotten zone, ignoring its play conditions.
cards.Passive: Lingering Death (Passive): When a friendly Mattervoid character is defeated; you may have it haunt the character it was defeated by.
cards.Special: Exhume (Special): Sacrifice another Mattervoid character: Choose a character in a forgotten zone, and either convert and play it into an open slot, or have it begin haunting an enemy character.

cards.Name: Midnight Cavalier
cards.Claim: Pale Horse (Claim): Return 3 Mattervoid characters from your forgotten zone to the bottom of your deck: Return a * character to its owner's hand.
cards.Passive: Conquest (Passive): When Midnight Cavalier defeats an Unsung character; discard a Mattervoid character: Draw 2 cards.
cards.Special: Unholy Gait (Special): Return 4 Mattervoid characters from your forgotten zone to the bottom of your deck: Midnight Cavalier attacks an uncontested Unsung character of your choice.

cards.Name: Malek, the Eternal Flame
cards.Passive:
Extinguish (Passive): When Malek, the Eternal Flame attacks a character that is haunted; defeat that character. 

Conscription (Passive): When Malek, the Eternal Flame defeats a character that was haunted; you may add a card named Malek's Faithful from your deck or forgotten zone to your hand.
cards.Special: Ghostly Command (Special): Return 3 Mattervoid characters from your forgotten zone to the bottom of your deck: Choose a Mattervoid character in your hand to begin haunting an enemy character.

cards.Name: Archon Brak'hir, the Animator
cards.Claim: Infernal Rapture (Claim): Sacrifice any number of other Mattervoid characters: Play that number of Mattervoid characters from your forgotten zone into open slots. You may only use this ability once per game.
cards.Passive: Keeper of the Tome (Passive): At the end of the round; you may add a card named Tome of Brak'hir from your forgotten zone to your hand.
cards.Special: Early Grave (Special):  Send a card from your deck to your forgotten zone.

cards.Name: Beelzebul's Apprentice
cards.Claim: Arcane Ritual (Claim): Sacrifice another friendly Mattervoid character: Add any Mattervoid card from your deck to your hand.
cards.Passive: Change of Heart (Passive): At the end of your opponent's turn; you may return any other uncontested and undamaged character to its owner's hand.
cards.Special: Oblivion (Special): Return 4 Mattervoid characters from your forgotten zone to the bottom of your deck: Remove a character under a friendly Mattervoid character from the game.

cards.Name: Widowmaker
cards.Passive: Ancestral Steel (Passive): When Widowmaker defeats a character that was being haunted; you may return Widowmaker to your hand.
cards.Special: Soul Slash (Special): Return 2 Mattervoid characters from your forgotten zone to the bottom of your deck: Friendly Mattervoid characters ignore Armour in the contest phase this turn.

cards.Name: Phasewalker of Nolán
cards.Claim: Siren's Song (Claim): Return 2 Mattervoid characters from your forgotten zone to the bottom of your deck: Convert a * Unsung character and move it to an open slot on either side of the board. At the end of the turn, return it to its owner's hand.
cards.Special: Portal Mastery (Special): Move Phasewalker of Nolán to an open slot.

cards.Name: Curse of Prescience
cards.Passive: Revelation (Passive): When an enemy character defeats or begins contesting Curse of Prescience; you may have Curse of Prescience haunt that character.
cards.Special: Transposition (Special): If Curse of Prescience is haunting an enemy character, you may return 2 Mattervoid characters in your forgotten zone to the bottom of your deck: Curse of Prescience begins haunting another enemy character.

cards.Name: Beelzebul's Abomination
cards.Passive: Gluttony (Passive): Beelzebul's Abomination has Power and Initiative equal to the number of Mattervoid characters in your forgotten zone.
cards.Special: Greed (Special): Send the top 3 cards from your deck to your forgotten zone.

cards.Name: Succubus
cards.Claim: Dark Massacre (Claim):  Sacrifice a friendly Mattervoid character: Reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is a Mattervoid card, draw 2 cards then discard a card. You may only use this ability once per turn.
cards.Passive: Bloodcrazed (Passive): At the end of each contest phase; if Succubus dealt damage during this phase; remove 2 damage from Succubus. You may then move Succubus to contest another enemy character. If there are no enemy characters that can be contested, you may instead move Succubus to an open slot.

cards.Name: Cemetery Wanderer
cards.Claim: Dispossession (Claim): Choose an enemy character: It is considered to be haunted by Cemetery Wanderer until the beginning of your next turn.
cards.Passive: Spooked (Passive): Enemy characters being haunted lose all abilities.

cards.Name: Nekomancer
cards.Claim: Ill Fate (Claim): Discard a card: Your opponent discards a card at random.
cards.Passive: Skittish (Passive): When an enemy character is played or moved into a slot contesting Nekomancer; you may move Nekomancer to an open slot.

cards.Name: Malek's Faithful
cards.Passive: Occult Persistence (Passive): Malek's Faithful cannot be defeated. At the end of each turn; if Malek's Faithful has 7 damage on it; send it to your forgotten zone.
cards.Special: Dust to Dust (Special): If Malek's Faithful is in your forgotten zone, you may remove it from the game: Add a card named Malek's Faithful or Malek, the Eternal Flame from your deck to your hand.

cards.Name: Glimpse the Void
cards.Effect: Place all enemy characters under friendly Mattervoid characters. When a Mattervoid character leaves the field; return characters under it to their owner's hand.

cards.Name: Feasting Frenzy
cards.Effect: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Mattervoid card, you may send it to the forgotten zone. You may repeat this effect any number of times. Remove damage from any character with Beelzebul in its name equal the number of cards sent to the forgotten zone this way.

cards.Name: Riddler Imp
cards.Claim: Riddler's Gambit (Claim): You and your opponent both choose a card in hand: Exchange those cards. You may immediately play the card you received, and if you do, convert it.
cards.Passive: Afterthought (Passive): When Riddler Imp is sacrificed by a Mattervoid character; search your deck for any card and add it to your hand. Discard a card at random.

cards.Name: Royal Spectre
cards.Claim: Decadence (Claim): Send the top card of your deck to the forgotten zone. Both players draw a card.
cards.Passive: Afterthought (Passive): When Royal Spectre is sacrificed by a Mattervoid character; draw a card.

cards.Name: Thoughtfiend
cards.Claim: Doppelganger (Claim): Convert and activate a Claim ability of an enemy * character.
cards.Passive: Afterthought (Passive): When Thoughtfiend is sacrificed by a Mattervoid character; you may convert and play a * character from your opponent's forgotten zone into an open slot.

cards.Name: Tome of Brak'hir
cards.Effect: Convert and return any number of characters that were defeated this turn to open slots.

cards.Name: Valkyrie
cards.Claim: Safe Passage (Claim): Remove a character under a friendly Mattervoid character from the game.
cards.Passive: Breath of Life (Passive): If a friendly Mattervoid character would be defeated and Valkyrie is uncontested; you may sacrifice Valkyrie: Return that character to your hand.
